messages.message:
<!here> Hi team,
As one of the measures for driving our infrastructure costs down, we will be changing the default OCR from Google-OCR to Microsoft-OCR to reduce the no of calls we are making to the Google-OCR.

Q: When and how?
A: We will making this change in phased approach. In the first phase, we will update the prod environment (instabase.com (http://instabase.com)) on 2 Sept 12:00PM IST. Since our existing golden tests will fail due to this change environments like dogfood, UAT and release sandboxes will be updated next week.

Q: What does this mean for my solutions?
A: Any flows and solutions using `OCR Model Type` as `default` can break due to a difference in process-files output.

Q: What is the recommended fix?
A: We would recommend migrating the flows/solutions to use the Microsoft-OCR since we want to reduce the dependency on Google-OCR. If your flow absolutely needs Google-OCR, then you should change the `OCR Model Type` to `Google Vision`.
